name: sync::nonpoison::rwlock::RwLockWriteGuard::<'rwlock, T>::map

core::convert::From::from.doc: Converts to this type from the input type.

sync::nonpoison::rwlock::RwLockWriteGuar: Unknown([Field(0, Ty { id: 11918, kind: RigidTy(Ref(Region { kind: ReErased }, Ty { id: 11954, kind: RigidTy(Adt(AdtDef(DefId { id: 9835, name: "sync::nonpoison::rwlock::RwLock" }), GenericArgs([Type(Ty { id: 396, kind: Param(ParamTy { index: 1, name: "T" }) })]))) }, Not)) })])

doc:
Makes a [`MappedRwLockWriteGuard`] for a component of the borrowed data, e.g.
 an enum variant.

 The `RwLock` is already locked for writing, so this cannot fail.

 This is an associated function that needs to be used as
 `RwLockWriteGuard::map(...)`. A method would interfere with methods of
 the same name on the contents of the `RwLockWriteGuard` used through
 `Deref`.

 # Panics

 If the closure panics, the guard will be dropped (unlocked).
